name: CaseFox
tag_list: legal-billing, invoicing, time-tracking, trust-accounting, software-for-lawyers, software-for-law-firms, time-and-billing-software
overview: CaseFox is designed to help attorneys, virtual firms, accountants and other professionals (such as freelancers, contractors, etc.) with their time based invoicing, trust accounting, time tracking, case tracking and client billing needs. CaseFox can track both billable and non-billable hours and expenses, monitor unbilled hours, late payments and handle trust accounting, case documents and case notes. CaseFox offers an intuitive multi-user interface. CaseFox also offers controlled access to data through user role management. Special role for contract staff. LEDES 1998B invoicing standard is supported. Single Sign On with Google credentials and synchronizing tasks with Google Tasks. CaseFox offers full featured no time limitation free plan (up to 4 cases/projects). Paid plans start only at $10 with unlimited users and clients. Entered data can be exported to MS Excel and PDF. Client payment management is also supported. CaseFox uses SSL for security and the most critical data in stored in the encrypted form in our databases.
